keyword.name: knime-label
keyword.desc: text component of the labels in the view (e.g. on sectors of pie chart, or values of box plot)

keyword.name: knime-axis
keyword.desc: selector to address a group of components related to an axis. One can specify the axis by combining the selector with a class knime-x or knime y. E.g. select('.knime-axis.knime-x') will address only X axis group.

keyword.name: knime-axis-label
keyword.desc: text component of the axis label

keyword.name: knime-axis-line
keyword.desc: line or path component of the axis

keyword.name: knime-axis-max-min
keyword.desc: group of components related to max or min axis values

keyword.name: knime-tick
keyword.desc: group of components related to a certain axis tick (for slider it represents pips group)

keyword.name: knime-tick-label
keyword.desc: text component of the axis tick (for slider it represents a pip label)

keyword.name: knime-tick-line
keyword.desc: line or path component of the axis tick (for slider it represents a pip tick)

keyword.name: knime-legend
keyword.desc: group of components representing the legend

keyword.name: knime-legend-symbol
keyword.desc: graphic component of the symbol legend (e.g. a colorful circle)

keyword.name: knime-tooltip
keyword.desc: group of components representing the tooltip. This also serves as a styling for collapsed columns in Data Explorer (when they are displayed in an extra rows), using knime-tooltip-caption and knime-tooltip-value.

keyword.name: knime-tooltip-caption
keyword.desc: text component for the caption of tooltip

keyword.name: knime-tooltip-color
keyword.desc: container for a color guide of tooltip

keyword.name: knime-tooltip-key
keyword.desc: text component representing the key of tooltip

keyword.name: knime-tooltip-value
keyword.desc: text component representing the value of tooltip

keyword.name: knime-tab
keyword.desc: tab component, e.g. in Data Explorer

keyword.name: knime-qf-title
keyword.desc: title of quickform. This one is called "Label" in the node dialog, but don't mix it up with knime-qf-label

keyword.name: knime-qf-label
keyword.desc: label in front of input controls (e.g. "Date", in Date and or "User", "Password" in Credentials)

keyword.name: knime-qf-input
keyword.desc: input component. Might be used with a specificator (e.g. knime-boolean)

keyword.name: knime-qf-select
keyword.desc: select component. Can be used with a specificator knime-single-line and knime-multi-line

keyword.name: knime-table-control-text
keyword.desc: text of control elements, like Search, Paging etc

keyword.name: knime-x
keyword.desc: specifies the dimension when needed. Should be used in a combination with knime classes, e.g. knime-axis

keyword.name: knime-y
keyword.desc: specifies the dimension when needed. Should be used in a combination with knime classes, e.g. knime-axis

keyword.name: knime-boolean
keyword.desc: type Boolean (e.g. in Boolean Input or row selection in Table View)

keyword.name: knime-double
keyword.desc: type Double (e.g. in Double Input or Table Editor)

keyword.name: knime-service-header
keyword.desc: component with control buttons (menu, selection etc.)

keyword.name: knime-qf-container
keyword.desc: wrapper container of a quickform control

keyword.name: knime-table-container
keyword.desc: wrapper container of a table based view
